summary: REQ-15 cannot be fully verified from the provided diff excerpt: App.tsx is truncated before the Contact section/button implementation. The diff also includes additional styling/theme changes (index.css and tailwind.config.js) that were not requested for this frontend-only link update.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the “Contact Me” button in the Contact section (frontend/src/App.tsx) to open the Gmail web compose page addressed to randombookcreator@gmail.com using a Gmail compose URL (not a mailto link), opening in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer", while keeping the label and styling consistent.
missing_requirements.reason: The only code shown from frontend/src/App.tsx is truncated before the Contact section; the actual Contact Me button/link markup (href/target/rel/label) is not present in the excerpt, so the acceptance criteria cannot be confirmed from the diff evidence alone.

hallucinated_features.description: Major global visual/theme changes (psychedelic color palette, layered background overlays, enhanced typography/animations).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to update the Contact Me button link behavior; it does not request sitewide styling/theme changes.
